europeana:record.dc:title: Nemertesia tropica spec. nov. from Indonesian waters near Bali. Description of the new species and a review of the genus Nemertesia Lamouroux, 1812 (Leptothecata, Hydrozoa, Cnidaria)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Ramil F.
Vervoort W.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Invertebrata: overige
Cnidaria
Hydrozoa
Leptolida
Leptothecata
Plumulariidae
Nemertesia
Indonesian waters
europeana:record.dc:description: A new species of the leptolid family Plumulariidae, Nemertesia tropica spec. nov. is described. The various species of Nemertesia are listed and their synonymy and characters discussed. Allocation in Nemertesia of some species previously described in Plumularia by Fraser (1938-1948) necessitated the introduction of two new names, viz. Nemertesia californica nom. nov. for Plumularia mutabilis Fraser, 1948 and Nemertesia mexicana nom. nov. for Plumularia reversa Fraser, 1938.
